duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform property maintenance including corrective, preventative, routine, emergency, and cosmetic maintenance as per property operational objectives.
Respond to resident/management requests for community common areas, buildings, and units in a timely manner.
Maintain accurate records regarding service requests, EPA/OSHA standards, preventative maintenance, apartment make-ready status, work in progress, etc.
Participate in on-call emergency at the community and utilize property resources, equipment, and supplies economically.
Report observed violations of community rules and regulations to the Maintenance Supervisor and/or Community Manager.
Assist in the general upkeep, maintenance, and cleaning of office, common areas, and model unit.
